testcase.name: Validate the forgotten password with invalid mobile number
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the browser and load the url of page...............passed When User should click the forgotten password link..........................passed And User should enter invalid mobile number in the text box.................passed And User should print the title of the page.................................passed And User should click the search button.....................................passed Then User should navigate to temp blocked page..............................passed

testcase.classname: Validate the login functionality of facebook
